Name: Deserted Island
About the game: A creative, ambient survival game. As you explore this new deserted island, you collect items, craft and build in order to survive and prosper in your world. Each game is unique and designed to give you a relaxing experience. Your deserted island awaits! Features: Calm, relaxing retro music tracks Seed based island generation 49 crafting recipes from 7 research branches Terraforming, building, fishing, farming, machinery and much more Dynamic nature and ambience Buildings with modifiable interiors
